description: Investigates and evaluates property and casualty insurance claims, determining coverage and settlement amounts while managing complex multi-party claims and catastrophe situations. Mentors junior adjusters and serves as subject matter expert for claim valuation.

tasks.task_name: Damage Assessment and Repair Cost Estimation

description: Processes and adjudicates health insurance claims, verifying coverage eligibility, medical necessity, and calculating benefit payments according to policy terms and regulatory requirements. Handles routine and moderately complex claims with high volume throughput.

tasks.task_name: Claim Data Entry and Initial Processing
Automated Claim Adjudication and Decision Generation

Coordination of Benefits and Secondary Payer Determination

description: Reviews and approves life insurance claims for payment, conducting underwriting reviews and investigating potential fraud or policy violations before claim settlement. Handles high-value claims and establishes precedent for claim interpretation.

Beneficiary Verification and Claim Entitlement Confirmation

description: Examines disability and workers' compensation claims, reviewing medical documentation and vocational assessments to determine benefit eligibility and duration. Manages ongoing claims monitoring and benefit continuation reviews.

Occupational Requirements Matching and Job Duties Analysis

description: Manages claims documentation, file organization, and records management while providing administrative support to claims adjusters and examiners. Ensures compliance with document retention policies and supports digital file conversion initiatives.

tasks.task_name: Maintain Claims File Metadata and Tracking

description: Provides frontline customer support for claims inquiries, status updates, and documentation requests via phone, email, and chat. Escalates complex issues and maintains high customer satisfaction while processing routine claim-related transactions.

tasks.task_name: Answer Routine Claims Inquiries via Phone and Email

tasks.task_name: Investigate and Analyze Complex Claim Issues

description: Receives and processes initial claim notifications for commercial property and liability policies, gathering preliminary information and routing claims to appropriate adjusters. Manages intake workflows and ensures timely claim acknowledgment.

tasks.task_name: Perform Data Accuracy and Consistency Checks

role_name: First Notice of Loss Agent - Catastrophe Response
description: Deploys to disaster areas following major weather events or catastrophes to provide immediate claim intake, emergency assistance, and customer support at mobile command centers. Gathers detailed loss information and initiates rapid claim processing.

workloads.workload_name: Disaster Area Claims Intake and Loss Documentation

tasks.task_name: Provide Immediate Emotional Support to Affected Customers

Facilitate Access to Medical and Mental Health Services
Manage Mobile Command Center Setup and Operations
Coordinate Field Team Logistics and Scheduling
Provide Technical Support to Field Adjusters
Coordinate with Senior Management and Executives
Track Catastrophe Claim Metrics and Reporting

role_name: First Notice of Loss Agent - 24/7 Hotline
description: Staffs round-the-clock claims hotline to receive initial loss notifications, conduct preliminary investigations, and dispatch adjusters or emergency services as needed. Provides critical first response for urgent claims situations.

tasks.task_name: Answer Incoming Hotline Calls and Initiate Claims

description: Conducts complex fraud investigations involving surveillance, interviews, and evidence analysis to identify fraudulent claims and support legal proceedings. Develops investigation strategies and mentors junior investigators on sophisticated fraud schemes.

description: Analyzes claims data and patterns using AI-powered fraud detection tools to identify suspicious claims for investigation. Develops fraud indicators, validates detection algorithms, and supports predictive fraud prevention initiatives.

tasks.task_name: Analyze Claim Data for Fraud Indicators Using AI

Generate Initiative Performance Reports and Dashboards

Assess Data Quality Issues Affecting Fraud Models
Implement Data Cleaning and Standardization Procedures
Document Data Quality Improvements and Algorithm Changes

description: Develops and maintains predictive models and analytics dashboards to identify claims trends, reserve adequacy, and operational inefficiencies. Provides data-driven recommendations to improve claims processing and reduce costs.

tasks.task_name: Develop Predictive Models for Claims Outcomes

Monitor Production Model Performance and Drift
Design Analytics Dashboard Layout and Visualizations

description: Manages salvage and disposal of damaged property from settled claims, coordinating with salvage vendors and auction services to maximize recovery value. Tracks salvage proceeds and ensures proper accounting and documentation.

description: Pursues collection of subrogation receivables and overpayments from claimants and third parties through negotiation, payment plans, and legal action when necessary. Maintains recovery tracking systems and reports on collection metrics.

tasks.task_name: Track Subrogation Case Status and Aging
